## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `flutter analyze` with no issues
- [ ] I have run `flutter format` on all modified files

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Mobile Specific
- [ ] Tested on Android emulator/device
- [ ] Tested on iOS simulator/device (if applicable)
- [ ] UI looks correct on different screen sizes
- [ ] No performance degradation introduced
- [ ] App works in offline mode (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] Updated README.md (if needed)
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md (if needed)
- [ ] Added/updated code comments
- [ ] Updated API documentation (if needed)

### Security & Best Practices
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords) in code
- [ ] Proper error handling implemented
- [ ] Edge cases considered and handled
- [ ] No console.log or print statements left in code

**Reviewer Guidelines:**
